options.name: Free Action : Kick
options.description: When you successfully hit a Target with a Slashing, Crushing or Piercing Weapon, you can follow it up with an Unarmed Strike.

options.name: Action : Windup
options.description: You prepare a vicious strike, winding up for a powerful blow. Until the end of your turn, you cannot Move but gain a +1d4 Bonus on your next Attack with a Unarmed or Melee Weapon. If that attack hits, it is upgraded to a Brutal Critical.

options.name: Melee Specialist
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Slashing, Piercing, Crushing and Unarmed Strikes

options.name: Scrapper
options.description: Your Unarmed Attack Modifier becomes equal to the highest of your Slashing, Piercing or Crushing Attack Modifiers

options.name: Impact Fighting
options.description: Gain +1 Damage to all Melee Attacks

options.name: Effective Blows
options.description: Your Unarmed Strikes deal extra damage equal to your Strength Bonus Modifier instead of your Unarmed Bonus Modifier. Additionally, your True Hits with Slashing, Crushing, Piercing and Unarmed Strikes are upgraded to Critical Hits.
